Text: Ms Fenmore you are a hero here in Australia,we cant get Y&R here unless we pay big bucks for pay tv and most fans cant afford it, so I hope you know how just how appriciated you are,if it wasn't for you we would miss our favourite soapy,thanks again.
Totally Agree with katien44 - Thank you so much for the time and effort involved just to share with people - You are very much appreciated

Thank you so much! And you´re very welcome..you know, I´m from Germany, and we don´t have one single soap here left...but I found a way get watch it in the internet, thank god...so why not share it with you all...

The episodes you upload are excellent quality - Apart from torrents all i could ever find was terrible youtube quality - would love to know where you find these in case you ever stop sharing - Thanks to you I get these for my mum and also Days of our lives (Also on this site)
the site I get the shows from is onlinetvrecorder.com . It´s a german website but it´s also avaible in english, a while ago they started with some of the US-channels, that was my luck!
